00023 #pragma once
00024 #define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
00025 #include <cstdio>
00026 #include <cstring>
00027 #include <fstream>
00028 #include <iostream>
00029 #include <string>
00030 #include <tchar.h>
00031 //
00032 
00033 using namespace std;
00034 
00035 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00036 {
00037         string path = argv[0];
00038         path.resize(path.length()-17);
00039         cout << "APT Install Location: " << path << '\n';
00040         string file = path + "\\bin\\apt-vars.bat";
00041         cout << "Generating Var File: " << file << '\n';
00042         ofstream varFile(file.c_str());
00043         varFile << "@echo off\n";
00044         varFile << "@set APTROOT=" << path << "\n";
00045         varFile << "@set PATH=%APTROOT%\\bin;%PATH%\n";
00046         varFile << "echo Configuring Affymetrix Power Tools (APT) Command Prompt\n";
00047         varFile << "echo   APT Root: %APTROOT%\n";
00048         varFile << "echo   APT Version: NON-OFFICIAL-RELEASE\n";
00049         varFile << "@cd %userprofile%\\Desktop\n";
00050         varFile << "%comspec% /k\n";
00051         return 0;
00052 }
